newsitem.title: USA: Sterling $165 mln acquisition on track.
newsitem.headline: Sterling $165 mln acquisition on track.

text.p: Sterling Software Inc said Thursday that it was on track to close its planned acquisition of Texas Instruments Software, a unit of Texas Instruments Inc, in mid-June.
The company said in April that it has signed a definitive agreement to purchase the TI operation, which is a pioneer in component-based technology, or $165 million, cash.

The company also said that its applications development products are in a transition, with revenue from traditional computer-aided software engineering development tools declining, although first quarter revenue grew in its KEY;workgroup development tools.
